description: Continued fraction for prime constant A051006.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Prime Constant.
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
mathematica: ContinuedFraction[ FromDigits[{{Table[ If[ PrimeQ[n], 1, 0], {n, 370}]}, 0}, 2], 95] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jan 15 2005 *)
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=0; m=67000; for (n=1, m, if (isprime(n), a=1, a=0); x=2*x+a; ); x=contfrac(x/2^m); for (n=0, 20000, write("b051007.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 15 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A010051, A051006. Increasing partial quotients are in A102878.
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
